name: Exercise 3 - Data Narrative
description: You and your friends from the ice empire suddenly are transported to lava land. Gravity seems to not work in this new environment, your friends are floating aimlessly in the air. Save them by restoring their ice levels after they touch the lava.  Because you are made of thinner ice, somehow you have more balance and control of your mass, but make sure to stay out of the lava or you'll lose! In addition, what adventure would it be if there weren't some lava land inhabitants in your way preventing you to help your friends(?)
